credit_line: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
title: Oni Demon
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
description: In the form of the demon Oni, with small upright horns, curly hair, broad  nose, wide, toothy grin, clawed fingers and toes, holding lantern; body rust-red in color, with facial features, lantern, garments and claws in copper. Head hinged at back, flips open as lid. Striker on bottom.
name: Matchsafe
